resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/78024</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>78024</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>e50aa6b0-7373-4238-aec3-81cdd29e696e#1#7</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az élővilág evolúciója és bizonyítékai</string>
            <string language="en">Evolution of living word and its evidences</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entwicklung des lebenden Wortes und seiner 
Beweise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Évolution de mot vivant et de ses évidences</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Evolução de palavra viva e de suas evidências</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sviluppo della parola vivente e delle relative 
prove</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξέλιξη της λέξης διαβίωσης και των στοιχείων του</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Evolución de la palabra viva y de sus evidencias</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A fajok keletkezése - földrajzi elkülönülés, ökológiai elkülönülés, adaptív szétterjedés; koevolúció; konvergens és divergens fejlődés; az evolúció közvetlen és közvetett bizonyítékai; kormeghatározási módszerek</string>
            <string language="en">The beginning of spieces - geographical separation, ecological separation, coevolution, convergent and divergent development, direct and indirect evidences of evolution, chronology methods</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">evolúció,  adaptív szétterjedés,  kövületek,  kormeghatározás,  konvergencia,  divergencia,  </string>
            <string language="en">evolution, adaptive spread, petrifactions, chronology, convergence, divergence</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Anfang von spieces - geographische Trennung, 
ökologische des coevolution, konvergenter und unterschiedlicher 
Entwicklung, direkte und indirekte Beweise der Trennung, der 
Entwicklung, Chronologiemethoden</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le début des spieces - séparation géographique,
évidences écologiques de séparation, de coevolution, convergentes 
et divergentes de développement, directes et indirectes d'évolution,
méthodes de chronologie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O começo dos spieces - separação geográfica, 
evidências ecological da evolução, métodos da separação, do 
coevolution, as convergent e as divergent do desenvolvimento, as 
diretas e as indiretas do chronology</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'inizio degli spieces - separazione geografica, 
prove dirette ed indirette convergenti e divergenti ecologiche di 
sviluppo, metodi di separazione, di coevolution, di sviluppo, di 
cronologia</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αρχή των spieces - γεωγραφικός χωρισμός, 
οικολογικός χωρισμός, coevolution, συγκλίνουσα και διάφορη 
ανάπτυξη, άμεσα και έμμεσα στοιχεία της εξέλιξης, μέθοδοι 
χρονολογίας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El principio de los spieces - separación 
geográfica, evidencias ecológicas de la evolución, métodos de la 
separación, del coevolution, convergentes y divergentes del 
desarrollo, directas e indirectas de la cronología</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entwicklung, anpassungsfähige Verbreitung, 
petrifactions, Chronologie, Konvergenz, Abweichung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">évolution, diffusion adaptative, petrifactions, 
chronologie, convergence, divergence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">evolução, propagação adaptável, petrifactions, 
chronology, convergência, divergence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sviluppo, diffusione adattabile, petrifactions, 
cronologia, convergenza, divergenza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξέλιξη, προσαρμοστική, petrifactions, χρονολογία, 
σύγκλιση, απόκλιση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">evolución, extensión adaptante, petrifactions, 
cronología, convergencia, divergencia</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">17-18</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>78024</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
